description.name: description
description.value:
Tested under WinXP, PHP5.2.5, r11871

{code}
29) testDefaultHelperPath(Zend_ViewTest)
Failed asserting that <boolean:false> is true.

30) testAddHelperPath(Zend_ViewTest)
Actual: array (
  'Zend_View_Helper_' =>
  array (
    0 => 'Zend/View/Helper/',
    1 => 'baz/',
    2 => 'bar/',
    3 => 'foo/',
  ),
)
Expected: array (
  0 => 'Zend/View/Helper/',
  1 => 'baz\\',
  2 => 'bar\\',
  3 => 'foo\\',
)
array key <integer:1>:  expected string <baz\>
                        difference      <   x>
                        got string      <baz/>
array key <integer:2>:  expected string <bar\>
                        difference      <   x>
                        got string      <bar/>
array key <integer:3>:  expected string <foo\>
                        difference      <   x>
                        got string      <foo/>


31) testAddFilterPath(Zend_ViewTest)
Actual: array (
  'Zend_View_Filter_' =>
  array (
    0 => 'Zend/View/Filter/',
    1 => 'baz/',
    2 => 'bar/',
    3 => 'foo/',
  ),
)
Expected: array (
  0 => 'Zend/View/Filter/',
  1 => 'baz\\',
  2 => 'bar\\',
  3 => 'foo\\',
)
array key <integer:1>:  expected string <baz\>
                        difference      <   x>
                        got string      <baz/>
array key <integer:2>:  expected string <bar\>
                        difference      <   x>
                        got string      <bar/>
array key <integer:3>:  expected string <foo\>
                        difference      <   x>
                        got string      <foo/>


32) testSetConfigInConstructor(Zend_ViewTest)
array (
  'Zend_View_Helper_' =>
  array (
    0 => 'Zend/View/Helper/',
  ),
  'My_View_Helper_' =>
  array (
    0 => 'C:\\Voxtronic\\3rdParty\\Zend Framework\\tests\\Zend\\View\\_stubs\\He
lperDir1/',
  ),
)
Failed asserting that <boolean:false> is true.

33) testHelperPathWithPrefix(Zend_ViewTest)
Failed asserting that two strings are equal.
expected string <C:\Voxtronic\3rdParty\Zend Framework\tests\Zend\View\_stubs\Hel
perDir1\>
difference      <                                               xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
xxxxxxxx>
got string      <C:\Voxtronic\3rdParty\Zend Framework\tests\Zend/View/_stubs/Hel
perDir1/>

34) testHelperPathWithPrefixAndRelativePath(Zend_ViewTest)
Failed asserting that <string:Zend/View/_stubs/HelperDir1/> contains "Zend\View\
_stubs\HelperDir1\".

35) testFilterPathWithPrefix(Zend_ViewTest)
Failed asserting that two strings are equal.
expected string <C:\Voxtronic\3rdParty\Zend Framework\tests\Zend\View\_stubs\Hel
perDir1\>
difference      <                                               xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
xxxxxxxx>
got string      <C:\Voxtronic\3rdParty\Zend Framework\tests\Zend/View/_stubs/Hel
perDir1/>

36) testSetBasePath(Zend_ViewTest)
array (
  'Zend_View_Helper_' =>
  array (
    0 => 'Zend/View/Helper/',
    1 => 'C:\\Voxtronic\\3rdParty\\Zend Framework\\tests\\Zend\\View\\helpers/',

  ),
)
Failed asserting that <boolean:false> is true.

37) testAddBasePath(Zend_ViewTest)
array (
  'Zend_View_Helper_' =>
  array (
    0 => 'Zend/View/Helper/',
    1 => 'C:\\Voxtronic\\3rdParty\\Zend Framework\\tests\\Zend\\View\\helpers/',

  ),
)
Failed asserting that <boolean:false> is true.

38) testAddBasePathWithClassPrefix(Zend_ViewTest)
array (
  'Zend_View_Helper_' =>
  array (
    0 => 'Zend/View/Helper/',
  ),
  'My_Foo_Helper_' =>
  array (
    0 => 'C:\\Voxtronic\\3rdParty\\Zend Framework\\tests\\Zend\\View\\helpers/',

  ),
)
Failed asserting that <boolean:false> is true.

39) testSetBasePathFromConstructor(Zend_ViewTest)
array (

array (

value.name: Zend_View
value.description: View portion of the ZF MVC

value.body: Fixed in trunk. Tests only failed against trunk, not 1.6 branch, and were due to changes in PluginLoader.
Changing issues in preparation for the 1.7.0 release.
